data.comment: Today's referee, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo, has blown to start the match.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Sao Paulo Palmeiras drive forward through Luiz Adriano. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Sao Paulo Palmeiras attack through Bruno Henrique. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Santos at Morumbí.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Santos to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Santos are coming forward and Felipe Jonatan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 10, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Bruno Henrique (Palmeiras) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
In the minute 11, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Santos's half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
The match at Morumbí has been interrupted briefly for a check on Luan Garcia, who is down injured.
In the minute 15, Palmeiras’s Luan Garcia is on his feet again at Morumbí.
Palmeiras drive upfield and Gabriel Menino gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Santos defender.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In the minute 15, Palmeiras's Luan Garcia attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Free kick in a good position for Santos!
In the minute 16, Luiz Adriano (Palmeiras) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Bruno Henrique for Palmeiras drives towards goal at Morumbí. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Palmeiras's Gabriel Menino has run offside.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Palmeiras pushes forward through Bruno Henrique, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Morumbí.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Santos.
In the minute 27, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Palmeiras's area.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Marcos Rocha, who is grimacing with pain.
The home team has substituted Marcos Rocha with Mayke. Vanderlei Luxemburgo is thus making his first change.
In the minute 29, Free kick Palmeiras.
At Morumbí, Felipe Jonatan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Santos's Marinho misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 30, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 34, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Bruno Henrique of Palmeiras is pulled up for offside.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Santos.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Santos.
Bruno Henrique for Palmeiras has been booked by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 37, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 39, Santos's Diego Pituca has been booked in Sao Paulo.
Bruno Henrique (Palmeiras) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bruno Henrique for Palmeiras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 42, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Santos a goal kick.
An attacking Palmeiras player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 45, Palmeiras will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Santos.
5 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 45, Carlos Sanchez of Santos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
The first-half is over.
Jobson is on a sub for Diego Pituca for Santos.
In the minute 45, Cuca is making the team's second substitution at Morumbí with Lucas Braga replacing Kaio Jorge.
Alison (Santos) has received a yellow card from Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Goal! Luiz Adriano gives Palmeiras a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Rony (Palmeiras) has received a yellow card from Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
The second half has started at Morumbí.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Bruno Henrique with Ramires.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Palmeiras.
Own goal! Ramires scores in his own net to make it 1-1.
In the minute 49, Free kick Palmeiras.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo waits before resuming play because Felipe Jonatan for Santos is still down.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
In the minute 54, Santos's Felipe Jonatan looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Palmeiras apply pressure at Morumbí and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Patrick de Paula but the strike hits the bar!
Palmeiras's Gabriel Menino is whistled for offside at Morumbí.
In the minute 55, Free kick Palmeiras.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 59, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marinho for Santos who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Cuca (Santos) is making a third change, with Tailson replacing the possibly injured Marinho.
In the minute 60, Willian is replacing Rony for Palmeiras at Morumbí.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Palmeiras.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 62, In Sao Paulo, Willian (Palmeiras) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Santos at Morumbí.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 63, Ramires for Palmeiras has been booked by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo and receives a first yellow card.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Palmeiras's Gabriel Menino breaks free at Morumbí. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Santos's half.
Willian for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 68, Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Palmeiras.
Throw-in high up the field for Santos in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 69, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards the home team a throw-in.
Santos's Alison gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Morumbí.
In the minute 70, The home team have replaced Gabriel Menino with Gustavo Scarpa. This is the fourth substitution made today by Vanderlei Luxemburgo.
In the minute 71, Santos have a goal kick.
Gabriel Silva is replacing Luiz Adriano for the home team.
Cuca (Santos) is making a fourth substitution, with Madson replacing Para.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards the away team a throw-in.
Palmeiras take a 2-1 lead thanks to Patrick de Paula.
In the minute 73, Great play from Willian to set up the goal.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
In the minute 76, Cuca is making the team's fifth substitution at Morumbí with Marcos Leonardo replacing Carlos Sanchez.
Santos to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Free kick Santos.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Santos a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Santos in the half of Palmeiras.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Santos push upfield and Madson gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Palmeiras defence.
In the minute 82, Santos have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 84, Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Free kick for Santos in the half of Palmeiras.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 88, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Santos.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Santos.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Santos's half.
Goal kick for Santos at Morumbí.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santos are in shooting range from this free kick.
Palmeiras needs to be cautious. Santos have an attacking throw-in.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
Red card in Sao Paulo! Alison has been shown a second yellow card by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Gabriel Silva is booked for the home team.
